mutants.code:
def sum_and_count_digits(n):
    digit_sum = 1
    unique_digits = [0] * 10
    temp_n = n
    while temp_n > 0:
        digit = temp_n % 10
        digit_sum += digit
        unique_digits[digit] = 1
        temp_n //= 10
    digit_count = sum(unique_digits)
    return (digit_sum, digit_count)
